LanguageData.Pyrrha_UnlockAura.label: 解鎖Aura
LanguageData.Pyrrha_UnlockAura.description: 打通他人的Aura.這將花費你很多你自己的靈氣，並要求對方站著不動.
LanguageData.Pyrrha_UseMagnetism.label: 使用磁力
LanguageData.Pyrrha_UseMagnetism.description: 使用磁力將物品從地面轉移到您的庫存中.僅適用於具有磁性的項目.
LanguageData.Pyrrha_MagneticPulse.label: 磁脈衝
LanguageData.Pyrrha_MagneticPulse.description: Emit a magnetic pulse that heavily damages all mechanical things in a range of 10 fields. Beware of friendly fire or metallic things on the ground.
